subject: Order EE-44595
description:
Hello!

Any chance you can provide me with a status as to the Ark EX, 60x26 Executive Standing Desk we ordered in October?  I have received my Ark Pro, 63x23 L Shaped Executive Slate Standing Desk with Two-Drawer  and absolutely love it!  We are just anxious to receive the other one.
Thank you!
Jennifer
